channel.title: Should abortion be allowed in America?
channel.description:
Well, What is it? Should abortion be legal or illegal? Right now I believe it is legal, but I personaly believe this is murder (A.K.A. Illegal).
if you posted, plz post why

item.title: Should abortion be allowed in America?
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

well, i think it should be legal, i mean it’s the couple’s baby they should wtvr they want with it.

This topic reminds me of how bush is a hypocrite.

Bush’s views on stem cell reasearch

No human life should be produced or destroyed for the benefit of others.

Bush’s views on the death penalty

I believe that the death penalty, when used properly, can benefit to others.

Contradicting much?

item.description:
@1337h4x wrote:

I think it should be legal. Its not a women’s/man’s fault if someone gets pregnant.

It might hurt the mother if something goes wrong…plus if you’re 13 and pregnant, you should be able to abort because
you could die if you don’t. (something about hips not being wide enough )

Read full topic
item.source: Should abortion be allowed in America?

item.title: Should abortion be allowed in America?
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

[quote=“BlackThursday, post:16, topic:2868”][quote author=Ron link=topic=3180.msg35876#msg35876 date=1148326809]
legal. Who cares if whatever inside you dies. At least it won’t grow up in crappy conditions and probably end up becoming a rapist or thief or some other kind of criminal.

Have kids when you’re ready to have kids.
You’re probably ready when…

  • Good job
  • Stable Life, nothing crazy going on
  • Married lol

But not in a car when you’re 16 years old. The 4 people that want to make it illegal have probably not had sex, are christian and want to be a good christian by doing the good in the christian world (fuck that).

If abortion is illegal, then I would tell any girl that didn’t want a baby, to go roll down a staircase. It might hurt a little, but at least her life, her child’s life, and other lives won’t be ruined due to the mistake of having a baby when you’re not ready.

~Ron
[/quote]

Dude thats kinda messed up…[/quote]
I actually agree with Ron. Pregnancy(sp?) can easily happen by mistake, and if there is something growing in your body that you do not want, then you should have every right to kill it. It is not like it actually feels anything.

Read full topic

item.title: Should abortion be allowed in America?
item.dc:creator: @Arkanor Arkanor
item.description:
@Arkanor wrote:

Abortion is really, really, really complicated. Like, I support the death penalty but oppose abortion, so I’ll get crap like “Why is it ok to kill only some people but not others?”

Simple enough to that. There are alternatives to killing the baby, like giving it to adoption centers, etc. Some people, on the other hand, for example that 9/11 conspirator, deserve to fry. Granted, abortions when necessary to save the life of the mother are an entirely different story.

Read full topic
